Japanese diet is a very effective, low-calorie, protein-rich diet. Since it will get your metabolism back to life, all the weight lost during this period is not expected to return anytime soon, if ever.

This is exactly the main (but not only) advantage of the Japanese diet. The diet’s only disadvantage is that your organism will have a shortage of vitamins, hence it’s recommended to use vitamin supplements.

It’s not recommended to have this diet more often than once a year. Thosу who have kidneys, heart and cardio-vascular system, or liver related issues, should avoid it altogether.

Prohibited products:
-Salt
-Spices and sauces
-Bananas and other very sweet fruits
-Fat rich meat
-Fat rich fish
-Flour products
-Milk
-Alcohol
-Carbonated drinks

Keep in mind:
-Coffee can be replaced with green tea
-During the day, you must drink a lot of water!

How to finish the diet right?
Keep eating small portions of food and eat the products that are included in the diet, but start adding one new product each day. During the first day after the diet, adding porridge (quacker or buckwheat-based).

Expected results - loss of 6-10 kg.

The shortest of this series of diets, suitable for those who want to lose a couple of kilograms in an incredibly short period
A few more days and more restrictions. suitable for those who want to be healthier and feel better, on top of having a weight loss
Suitable for those who are self-confident and have no doubt that they will cope with all the difficulties, as they seek to get a thorough change
The most difficult diet, but also the most effective in terms of weight loss

Important!

1. By clicking on any of the days, you will see an additional window has opened under it, in which you can specify your weight for a specified period of time. This data will immediately appear on the chart at the bottom of the page. n\n\2. If you want to reset the chart, in the upper right corner of the application there is a menu icon, click on it, and then select the instruction - reset chart data
